feat-pestilence.description: All models within 3" gain a Poison (1) Marker and a Spirit Block Marker.
feat-pestilence.name: Pestilence
feat-pestilence.subject: Pulse

feat-phalanx.description: If this model would benefit from a Melee Assist, its Melee Weapons gain Brutal (1) until the end of the current activation.
feat-phalanx.name: Phalanx
feat-phalanx.subject: Personal

feat-pick_pocket.description: Target Friendly Urchin that is within 2" of an Enemy model. If the Enemy model has an enhancement - equipment card, transfer it to Fai-ginn's card.
feat-pick_pocket.name: Pick Pocket
feat-pick_pocket.subject: Target

feat-pile_on.description:
During an Enemy model's activation, when that model moves into BtB with another Friendly Bakemono model in the Pulse, move this model into BtB with that Enemy model by the shortest route.
If it is not possible to put this model in BtB with the Enemy model this feat cannot be used.
feat-pile_on.name: Pile On!
feat-pile_on.subject: Pulse

feat-pin_weapon.description:
Before the Enemy model chooses a Weapon to use in a Melee Exchange, choose a Weapon they have access to.
For the rest of the current activation, replace that Weapon on the Enemy model's card with:
Unarmed (-2 Melee Strength, no Traits, no Specials).
feat-pin_weapon.name: Pin Weapon
feat-pin_weapon.subject: Personal

feat-pinprick.description: When using this model's Blowgun weapon, instead of rolling a Damage Roll, you may choose to inflict 1 Damage ignoring Tough.
feat-pinprick.name: Pinprick
feat-pinprick.subject: Special

feat-practised_manoeuvres.description: When applying Melee Assist penalties for a Melee Exchange involving Lone Swordsmen, this model inflicts -2 dice rather than -1 until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.
feat-practised_manoeuvres.name: Practised Manoeuvres
feat-practised_manoeuvres.subject: Personal

feat-prayer_of_healing.description: This model may Target any model within the Aura with its Heal trait.
feat-prayer_of_healing.name: Prayer of Healing
feat-prayer_of_healing.subject: Aura

feat-prayer_of_purification.description: When this model uses its Heal trait, instead of Healing Wounds it may instead remove an equal number of Berserk, Blind, Controlled, Fire, Poison, Spirit Block, or Stunned Markers from the Target.
feat-prayer_of_purification.name: Prayer of Purification
feat-prayer_of_purification.subject: Personal

feat-prayer_of_undeath.description: Target Kairai receives a bonus of X to the final result of its next Rise Test this turn where X is the number of Ki Tokens spent; this may not be greater than 2.
feat-prayer_of_undeath.name: Prayer of Undeath
feat-prayer_of_undeath.subject: Pulse

feat-precision.description: This model's Weapons gain Pierce (1) until the current action is resolved.
feat-precision.name: Precision
feat-precision.subject: Personal

feat-precision_shot.description: This model's Ranged Weapons gain Pierce (1) until the current action is resolved.
feat-precision_shot.name: Precision Shot
feat-precision_shot.subject: Personal

feat-precision_strike.description: This model's weapons gain Pierce (1) until the current action is resolved.
feat-precision_strike.name: Precision Strike
feat-precision_strike.subject: Personal

feat-predators_detachment.description: This model gains Brutal (+1), Impenetrable Defence (1) and Prowess [Attack] (1) until the end of the current activation.
feat-predators_detachment.name: Predator's Detachment
feat-predators_detachment.subject: Personal

feat-prediction.description: This model's Controller's Opponent must declare which model they will choose as their next Activating model. If the model becomes ineligible before it is chosen as the Activating model then another model can be chosen without restriction.
feat-prediction.name: Prediction
feat-prediction.subject: Special

feat-proficiency.description: This model gains Feint (1) and Dodge (1) until the end of the activation.
feat-proficiency.name: Proficiency
feat-proficiency.subject: Personal

feat-promo.description: Whenever Target model makes a Fear Test against a Buto model, the Buto gains Terror.
feat-promo.name: Promo
feat-promo.subject: Target

feat-provoke.description: Target Enemy model gains an Impetuous Marker, the Opposing Player may not declare use of a Pass Token next activation.
feat-provoke.name: Provoke
feat-provoke.subject: Target

feat-psychic_drain.description: Transfer up to 3 Ki Tokens from the Target Enemy model's profile card to this card.
feat-psychic_drain.name: Psychic Drain
feat-psychic_drain.subject: Target

feat-psychic_venom.description: Target Enemy model gains X Poison (2) Markers. X may not be greater than 3.
feat-psychic_venom.name: Psychic Venom
feat-psychic_venom.subject: Target

feat-pulling_the_strings.description: You may Walk Target Enemy model 2".
feat-pulling_the_strings.name: Pulling the Strings
feat-pulling_the_strings.subject: Target

feat-quagmire.description: The Aura's area is considered [Difficult, Clear, Zero] terrain.
feat-quagmire.name: Quagmire
feat-quagmire.subject: Aura

feat-quick_march.description: All Friendly Ashigaru within the Aura ignore the Melee Penalty for having Run.
feat-quick_march.name: Quick March
feat-quick_march.subject: Aura

feat-quick_reload.description: Remove any Reload Markers from this model.
feat-quick_reload.name: Quick Reload
feat-quick_reload.subject: Personal

feat-rage.description:
Use this Ki Feat during the Starting Phase.
This model gains a Berserk Marker and gains Strong until the End Phase.
feat-rage.name: Rage
feat-rage.subject: Personal

feat-rage_against_time.description:
Non-Soulless, Non-Satsui models in the Pulse gain a Berserk Marker.
X=Current Turn Number.
feat-rage_against_time.name: Rage Against Time
feat-rage_against_time.subject: Pulse

feat-raijins_rage.description:
When this model makes a successful Ranged Attack, after that Attack is resolved but before its activation ends it may make an additional Ranged Attack against another model within 3" of the last model Targeted.
This Ranged Attack is considered to be in the Medium Range Band and ignores Range, LoS, and Camouflage.
feat-raijins_rage.name: Raijin's Rage
feat-raijins_rage.subject: Special

feat-rain_of_blows.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Combo Attack (0) and Lightning Reflexes until the end of the current Melee Exchange.
feat-rain_of_blows.name: Rain of Blows
feat-rain_of_blows.subject: Personal

feat-rally.description: Remove the Frightened state from all Friendly models in the Pulse.
feat-rally.name: Rally
feat-rally.subject: Pulse

feat-rampage.description: This model gains Agile and Indomitable (1) until the End Phase.
feat-rampage.name: Rampage
feat-rampage.subject: Personal

feat-rangefinder.description: Deploy a Signal Flag in BtB with this model if one is available.
feat-rangefinder.name: Rangefinder
feat-rangefinder.subject: Special

feat-rankiryu.description: Models in the Pulse that have been Placed this activation gain a Spirit Block Marker.
feat-rankiryu.name: Rankiryu
feat-rankiryu.subject: Pulse

feat-rappel.description: When deploying this model using the Flank Trait, you may ignore the chosen Battlefield edge and instead deploy in BtB with any Enemy models, ignoring Zones of Control.
feat-rappel.name: Rappel
feat-rappel.subject: Personal

feat-reanimate.description: This model may re-roll a failed Rise Test.
feat-reanimate.name: Reanimate
feat-reanimate.subject: Personal

feat-rebirth.description:
Replace this model by Deploying a Friendly Orphan model that has been removed from play; then remove this model from play.
The Orphan model gains Ki equal to its Ki statistic.
This effect may reduce this model's Ki Tokens to zero.
feat-rebirth.name: Rebirth
feat-rebirth.subject: Special

feat-recantation.description: When this model kills an Enemy model in a Melee Exchange, the Enemy model gains Last Stand and two Control Markers.
feat-recantation.name: Recantation
feat-recantation.subject: Target

feat-recite_sins.description: Remove a Shame Token from this model. If you do, this model's weapons gain Unblockable (1) until the end of this Activation.
feat-recite_sins.name: Recite Sins
feat-recite_sins.subject: Personal

feat-rectifying_shōmyō.description: When a Friendly model causes a Kami to be removed from play in a Melee Exchange while in the Aura, you may replace the Kami by Summoning and Deploying a Friendly, 8 Rice Cost, Kami with identical Elemental Icons (if the Enemy Kami has no Elemental Icons, you may replace it with a Lesser Void Kami).
feat-rectifying_shōmyō.name: Rectifying Shōmyō
feat-rectifying_shōmyō.subject: Aura

feat-redemption_strike.description:
Remove one Shame Token from this model.
If you do, this model gains Strong and its Naginata Weapon gains Brutal (1) until the end of this Activation.
feat-redemption_strike.name: Redemption Strike
feat-redemption_strike.subject: Personal

feat-reel_them_in!.description: When a Friendly model in the Pulse Damages an Enemy model with a Harpoon Ranged Attack, the Enemy model becomes Prone.
feat-reel_them_in!.name: Reel Them In!
feat-reel_them_in!.subject: Pulse

feat-reflexes.description: Move this model directly away from an Enemy model in BtB until it leaves its ZoC. After moving, this model must use Bodyguard. If it cannot, it doesn't Move.
feat-reflexes.name: Reflexes
feat-reflexes.subject: Personal

feat-regrowth.description: This model gains Regenerate (2) until the End Phase.
feat-regrowth.name: Regrowth
feat-regrowth.subject: Personal

feat-reiji_kinoko.description:
Replace this model with the Zoo model.
Recover or Inflict Wounds so that Zoo's profile card has the same number of Wounds marked as Xi-Han.
Transfer State Markers, Enhancements, and any Tokens to Zoo's profile card, Zoo gains an Impetuous Marker.
When this effect expires in the End Phase, replace Zoo with Xi-Han.
Recover or Inflict Wounds so that Xi-Han's profile has the same number of Wounds marked as Zoo.
Transfer State Markers, Enhancements, and any tokens to Xi-Han's profile card.
feat-reiji_kinoko.name: Reiji Kinoko
feat-reiji_kinoko.subject: Personal

feat-rend.description:
This model gains Brutal (+1) until the current action is resolved.
This model may only use this Feat once per Melee Exchange.
feat-rend.name: Rend
feat-rend.subject: Personal

feat-rend_soul.description: This model gains a Melee Strength bonus equal to X for the next Damage Roll this turn, where X is the number of Ki Tokens spent; this may not be greater than 3. This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.
feat-rend_soul.name: Rend Soul
feat-rend_soul.subject: Personal

feat-repentance_shomyo.description: Friendly models in the Aura can reroll Challenge Tests.
feat-repentance_shomyo.name: Repentance Shōmyō
feat-repentance_shomyo.subject: Aura

feat-reputation.description:
During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Stunned Marker.
This Ki Feat may only be used once per model in any activation.
feat-reputation.name: Reputation
feat-reputation.subject: Target

feat-requiem.description:
Kairai models cannot be Deployed in the Aura.
Models in the Aura cannot be Replaced with Kairai models.
feat-requiem.name: Requiem
feat-requiem.subject: Aura

feat-resolve_of_rock.description: This model gains Tireless and Construct until the End Phase.
feat-resolve_of_rock.name: Resolve of Rock
feat-resolve_of_rock.subject: Personal

feat-restitution.description: Until the End Phase, Target Friendly model with a Control Marker gains +1 to its Melee Pool and Ranged Pool while it has a Control Marker.
feat-restitution.name: Restitution
feat-restitution.subject: Target

feat-retract.description: This model becomes Prone or if Prone, this model loses the Prone State
feat-retract.name: Retract
feat-retract.subject: Personal

feat-rewarding_honour.description:
Target model Heals X Wounds.
Reduce this Heal by the number of Shame Tokens on models in the Warband.
feat-rewarding_honour.name: Rewarding Honour
feat-rewarding_honour.subject: Target

feat-riazzurs_flight.description:
When this model succeeds in a melee attack roll, Place the Enemy model in its Deployment Zone, the Enemy model gains a Prone Marker.
Make a Damage Roll as normal. Do not apply any of this model's Special Abilities to this Melee Exchange.
feat-riazzurs_flight.name: Riazzur's Flight
feat-riazzurs_flight.subject: Special

feat-ring_of_fire.description:
Centre a 4” Aura on the Battlefield Centre Point instead of on this model.
Models in the Aura, and models in BtB with models in the Aura, gain Immune [Held], lose Defensive and cannot allocate dice to Defence in Melee Exchanges.
feat-ring_of_fire.name: Ring of Fire
feat-ring_of_fire.subject: Special

feat-rivalry.description: Target other Friendly Faction model with Rice Cost equal to this model gains +1 to its Melee Pool or Ranged Pool until the End Phase
feat-rivalry.name: Rivalry
feat-rivalry.subject: Target

feat-rolling_boulder.description:
This model may declare a Charge action while BtB with an Enemy model this Activation.
After a Melee or Charge action declared by this model is resolved, move Enemy models within 1" directly away from this model until they leave this model's ZoC, and then move this model directly towards one of those Enemy models until it contacts the Enemy model.
After resolving all movement, make an opposed Size Test with each model moved, if this model is Successful the Enemy model gains a Prone Marker and suffers one Damage.
feat-rolling_boulder.name: Rolling Boulder
feat-rolling_boulder.subject: Personal

feat-sacrifice.description:
Remove Target Friendly, non-Soulless, non-Insignificant model that you own from play.
If you do, add 4 Ki Tokens to the Yuta of Yurei card.
feat-sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
feat-sacrifice.subject: Target

feat-saihai.description: Any Friendly Blood Brother models in the Pulse (including this model) may immediately perform a Walk up to their Walk Statistic in inches.
feat-saihai.name: Saihai
feat-saihai.subject: Pulse

feat-salvation.description: Oher models in the aura cannot be Killed. If a model in the Aura would have its final Wound Box marked, instead leave one box unmarked.
feat-salvation.name: Salvation
feat-salvation.subject: Aura

feat-sames_warning.description: Target model gains Sixth Sense until the End Phase
feat-sames_warning.name: Same's Warning
feat-sames_warning.subject: Target

feat-savage_beating.description: This model gains Combo Attack (0) until the current action is resolved.
feat-savage_beating.name: Savage Beating
feat-savage_beating.subject: Personal

feat-scorch_the_earth.description:
Place the Scorched Earth template in BtB with this model.
It is a Terrain element [Destructible][Difficult, Obscuring, Zero].
Models entering this Terrain gain a Fire (3) Marker.
Remove the Terrain element in the End Phase.
Add 1 Void Counter to the Blessings of the Void Communal Card.
feat-scorch_the_earth.name: Scorch the Earth
feat-scorch_the_earth.subject: Special

feat-scorn_stone.description: Transfer a Shame Token from this model to Target model.
feat-scorn_stone.name: Scorn Stone
feat-scorn_stone.subject: Target

feat-second_wind.description:
At the end of an activation in which this model declared a Charge action and caused Wounds in a Melee Exchange it gains an Activation Counter.
This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.
feat-second_wind.name: Second Wind
feat-second_wind.subject: Personal

feat-seduction.description: If this model is successful the Targeted model gains Stupid until the End Phase.
feat-seduction.name: Seduction
feat-seduction.subject: Target

feat-seed_of_destruction.description:
Place 2 Seed Counters on Target Enemy model.
Remove a Seed Counter each time the model activates, when the last Seed Counter is removed centre a 2" Pulse on the Target, deal 8 Damage split evenly (rounded down) between Enemy models in the Pulse.
This model may not use this Ki Feat while any Enemy model has Seed Counters.
feat-seed_of_destruction.name: Seed of Destruction
feat-seed_of_destruction.subject: Target

feat-self_taught_koryu.description: During a Melee Exchange, if the Enemy model re-rolls any of its Melee Pool dice, this model may add 1 to both of the results when calculating its final Attack and Defence results.
feat-self_taught_koryu.name: Self Taught Koryu
feat-self_taught_koryu.subject: Personal

feat-serpentine_sway.description:
Target Enemy model gains a Blind Marker and a Stunned Marker.
If the Target has any Poisoned Markers, they may not use Spirit or Resistance traits for the Opposed Ki Test for this feat.
feat-serpentine_sway.name: Serpentine Sway
feat-serpentine_sway.subject: Target

feat-set_the_scene.description: Place a piece of [Impassable, Blocking, Large], [Destructible] terrain that fits on a 50mm base onto the Battlefield. Remove it in the End Phase.
feat-set_the_scene.name: Set the Scene
feat-set_the_scene.subject: Special

feat-shadow.description: During an Enemy model's activation when it begins a movement in the Pulse, once the movement is completed this model may Walk up to its Move towards that model's final position.
feat-shadow.name: Shadow
feat-shadow.subject: Pulse

feat-shadow_arts.description: This model gains Lightfooted and Assassin until the end of the current activation.
feat-shadow_arts.name: Shadow Arts
feat-shadow_arts.subject: Personal

feat-shadow_crows.description: Place the Conjured Shadow Crows template in BtB with this model.
feat-shadow_crows.name: Shadow Crows
feat-shadow_crows.subject: Special

feat-shadow_rats.description: Exchange positions of this model with any Friendly Rat model in the pulse.
feat-shadow_rats.name: Shadow Rats
feat-shadow_rats.subject: Pulse

feat-shadow_tendrils.description: Target Enemy model suffers -3 Move until the End Phase.
feat-shadow_tendrils.name: Shadow Tendrils
feat-shadow_tendrils.subject: Target

feat-shadow_walk.description:
If this model is out of LoS of all enemy models, place it within 3" of its current location.
This feat can only be used once per activation.
This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.
feat-shadow_walk.name: Shadow Walk
feat-shadow_walk.subject: Personal

feat-shapeshift.description: Replace this model with its other form (Fox Form / Human Form). Transfer marked Wounds, State Markers, Enhancement, and any Tokens to the other model.
feat-shapeshift.name: Shapeshift
feat-shapeshift.subject: Special

feat-shared_blessings_of_the_celestial_f.description: In the End Phase when this model takes Poisoned Damage each Enemy model in BtB with this model also takes the same Poisoned Damage.
feat-shared_blessings_of_the_celestial_f.name: Shared Blessings of the Celestial Fang
feat-shared_blessings_of_the_celestial_f.subject: Special

feat-shared_reflexes.description: This model and Friendly Spectre models gain Brutal (1) and Parry (1) until the end of the Melee Exchange.
feat-shared_reflexes.name: Shared Reflexes
feat-shared_reflexes.subject: Special

feat-shared_senses.description: This model and Friendly Spectre models gain Aware and Ranged Defence (2) until the end of the current activation.
feat-shared_senses.name: Shared Senses
feat-shared_senses.subject: Special

feat-shiatsu.description: Remove one Berserk, Control, Frightened, Impetuous, Spirit Block or Stunned Marker from Target Non-Animal model.
feat-shiatsu.name: Shiatsu
feat-shiatsu.subject: Target

feat-ship_shape.description: When a Friendly Kaizoku in the Pulse performs a Wait or Scenario action, until the End Phase, they gain +1 Melee and Ranged Pool.
feat-ship_shape.name: Ship Shape
feat-ship_shape.subject: Pulse

feat-shrine_desecration.description:
Deploy a Desecrated Shrine in BtB with this model. It is a 30mm base, Clear - Normal, Destructible terrain piece with Believer [Shugenja](1/3") and Disturb Flow (1/6").
Remove the shrine if another is created or if Yugio is removed from play.
feat-shrine_desecration.name: Shrine Desecration
feat-shrine_desecration.subject: Personal

feat-shroud.description:
Enemy models that are not in the Aura cannot draw LoS to models completely inside the Aura.
Models completely in the Aura do not block Enemy model's LoS.
feat-shroud.name: Shroud
feat-shroud.subject: Aura

feat-sick_em!.description: When Friendly Animal models Target or participate in a Melee Exchange with chosen Enemy model, they gain Bravery and Co-ordinated Attack [Friendly] until the End Phase.
feat-sick_em!.name: Sick Em!
feat-sick_em!.subject: Special

feat-sidewinder.description:
Before a Melee Exchange, this model swaps positions with the Enemy model.
Both models must remain in BtB.
If either model cannot fit in the space available, this Ki Feat cannot be used.
feat-sidewinder.name: Sidewinder
feat-sidewinder.subject: Target

feat-signal.description: When you become the Active Player, before choosing to activate, choose any number of Friendly Kabuki models in the Pulse to activate in the same single activation. Each model resolves any movement before any Melee Exchanges are resolved. Melee Exchanges are then resolved in the order the Controlling player chooses.
feat-signal.name: Signal
feat-signal.subject: Pulse

feat-silence_of_the_void.description:
Use only in the Main Phase.
Add 2 to this model's statistics until the End Phase. This is considered a Ki Boost.
This Warband may use this Ki Feat only once per turn.
feat-silence_of_the_void.name: Silence of the Void
feat-silence_of_the_void.subject: Personal

feat-simian_trickery.description:
If Niseru is within 6" of this model choose:
• Place Niseru in BtB with this model. If this model is in BtB with an Enemy model, Niseru must also be placed in Bt with at least 1 Enemy model.
• Place this model in BtB with Niseru. If Niseru is in BtB with an Enemy model, this model must also be placed in BtB with at least 1 Enemy model.
feat-simian_trickery.name: Simian Trickery
feat-simian_trickery.subject: Personal

feat-sinister_web_of_the_jumping_spider.description: Poisoned Enemy models in the Aura cannot gain Activation Counters in the Main Phase.
feat-sinister_web_of_the_jumping_spider.name: Sinister Web of the Jumping Spider
feat-sinister_web_of_the_jumping_spider.subject: Aura

feat-sisterly_bond.description: Immediately Heal all Friendly Princesses in the Pulse to have the same number of marked Wound boxes as the least Wounded Friendly Princess model.
feat-sisterly_bond.name: Sisterly Bond
feat-sisterly_bond.subject: Pulse

feat-sisters_succour.description:
During an Enemy model's activation, when that model moves into BtB with another Friendly Princess model in the Pulse, move this model into BtB with that Enemy model by the shortest route.
If it is not possible to put this model in BtB with the Enemy model this feat cannot be used.
feat-sisters_succour.name: Sister's Succour
feat-sisters_succour.subject: Pulse

feat-skewer.description: When an Enemy model suffers Wounds in a Melee Exchange with this model, it may not move except to change facing until the End Phase.
feat-skewer.name: Skewer
feat-skewer.subject: Personal

feat-slice.description: Until the end of this activation, this model's Kama weapon gains Bleed (1/3) while in a Melee Exchange with a Surprised Enemy model.
feat-slice.name: Slice
feat-slice.subject: Personal

feat-slippery.description:
When this model makes a Disengage Action, it may double its melee pool.
If it does, this model must allocate all dice to Defence.
This Ki Feat may only be used once per activation.
feat-slippery.name: Slippery
feat-slippery.subject: Personal

feat-slipstream.description:
When this model Runs this activation, it may Move through other Friendly models.
It may not end its Move occupying the same area as an Impassable Terrain Element or another model.
Any model moved through can Move 1”.
feat-slipstream.name: Slipstream
feat-slipstream.subject: Personal

feat-slither.description: This model gains Agile and Evasive until the current action is resolved.
feat-slither.name: Slither
feat-slither.subject: Personal

feat-smash_your_dreams.description: Target model cannot benefit from the Brutal, Dodge, Feint, Kata, Lightning Reflexes, Parry, Prowess, or Reach traits until the end of the current activation.
feat-smash_your_dreams.name: Smash Your Dreams
feat-smash_your_dreams.subject: Target

feat-smite.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Slam Attack (0) until the current activation is resolved.
feat-smite.name: Smite
feat-smite.subject: Personal

feat-snap_shot.description: This model immediately makes a Ranged Attack ignoring Reload markers on this model.
feat-snap_shot.name: Snap Shot
feat-snap_shot.subject: Personal

feat-snare.description:
When an Enemy model without Cloudwalk or Intangible, and not in BtB with a Friendly model, declares a Walk in the Pulse, that model must make a Walk Challenge Test (X).
X is 8 for models declaring a Run or Charge Action. X is 7 otherwise.
If it fails the model may not Walk; if it was declaring an action, it loses an Activation Counter and its action is considered resolved.
This is a Trap effect.
feat-snare.name: Snare
feat-snare.subject: Pulse

feat-sneak.description: This model gains Evasive and Lightfooted until the End Phase.
feat-sneak.name: Sneak
feat-sneak.subject: Personal

feat-sojutsu.description: Target Friendly Ashigaru gains Co-ordinated Attack [Ashigaru] until the current action is resolved.
feat-sojutsu.name: Sojutsu
feat-sojutsu.subject: Target

feat-soothing_shomyo.description:
Models in the Aura gain Immune [Berserk].
When rolling a Damage Roll against a Friendly model within the Aura, after the result is determined, roll an additional dice and then choose 1 dice to remove, use the remaining 2 dice for the Damage Roll.
feat-soothing_shomyo.name: Soothing Shomyo
feat-soothing_shomyo.subject: Aura

feat-soul_fire.description: Target Enemy model gains a number of Fire (1) Markers equal to the Success Level of the Test +1 and a Spirit Block Marker.
feat-soul_fire.name: Soul Fire
feat-soul_fire.subject: Target

feat-soul_thirst.description: When an Enemy model is Killed within the Pulse, this model may Heal a number of Wounds and gain a number of Ki Tokens equal to the removed model's Ki Statistic.
feat-soul_thirst.name: Soul Thirst
feat-soul_thirst.subject: Pulse

feat-sound_the_advance!.description: Friendly Loyal models in the Pulse gain Fear (6) until the End Phase.
feat-sound_the_advance!.name: Sound the Advance!
feat-sound_the_advance!.subject: Pulse

feat-specialist_knowledge.description: A Friendly Samurai or Ashigaru model in BtB gains the Weighted Tetsubo Enhancement card if permitted.
feat-specialist_knowledge.name: Specialist Knowledge
feat-specialist_knowledge.subject: Personal

feat-spider_in_her_web.description: Each Enemy model in the Pulse must make a Size Challenge Test (6) and if Unsuccessful gains an Immobilised Marker.
feat-spider_in_her_web.name: Spider in Her Web
feat-spider_in_her_web.subject: Pulse

feat-spin.description: This model's Ranged Weapon's Range Bands become 4/6/8 and this model gains Strong [Ranged] until the current Activation is complete.
feat-spin.name: Spin
feat-spin.subject: Personal

feat-spirit_absolution.description:
This model loses Soulless, Slow, Tough, and Rise. This effect expires in the End Phase.
Target model not in BtB with a Friendly model gains an Impetuous Marker, must declare a Walk action as its next activation, and must move directly towards this model with its full Walk Statistic, changing facing so that this model is in LoS. If unable to perform a Walk action, it may activate without restriction.
feat-spirit_absolution.name: Spirit Absolution
feat-spirit_absolution.subject: Target

feat-spirit_guardian.description: When a Friendly model within the Pulse's area of effect is Targeted by an Enemy model's Ki Feat, change the Target to this model. Range is measured to the original Target.
feat-spirit_guardian.name: Spirit Guardian
feat-spirit_guardian.subject: Pulse

feat-spirit_sprint.description: When this model Runs it gains Intangible during its movement.
feat-spirit_sprint.name: Spirit Sprint
feat-spirit_sprint.subject: Personal

feat-spirit_ward.description: While within this Aura, Kami and Asura models cannot move closer to this model.
feat-spirit_ward.name: Spirit Ward
feat-spirit_ward.subject: Aura

feat-spiritual_conduit.description: Friendly Ito Shisai models within the Aura can use this model as the point of origin for Targeted Ki Feats when this model is not in BtB with or within an Enemy model's ZoC.Use this model to draw LoS and Range for the feat.
feat-spiritual_conduit.name: Spiritual Conduit
feat-spiritual_conduit.subject: Aura

feat-spotlight.description: You may centre a 2" Aura on a Friendly Lantern. Kabuki models in the Aura gain Kata. Kabuki models outside the Aura gain Insignificant while the Aura is on the Battlefield. If this Ki Feat is used again, by any model, the Aura on the previous Lantern expires.
feat-spotlight.name: Spotlight
feat-spotlight.subject: Special

feat-spur_on.description: Until the End Phase Target Friendly Animal model gains Rise (4) and loses the Aloof trait.
feat-spur_on.name: Spur On
feat-spur_on.subject: Target

feat-stagger.description: This model gains Ranged Defence (1) and Sidestep Defence (0) until the end of the current activation.
feat-stagger.name: Stagger
feat-stagger.subject: Personal

feat-stand_behind_me!.description: This model grants Cover as if it were terrain until the end of the current activation.
feat-stand_behind_me!.name: Stand Behind Me!
feat-stand_behind_me!.subject: Personal

feat-starless_midnight_chitin.description: This model gains Armour equal to its Fear Value until the end of the current activation.
feat-starless_midnight_chitin.name: Starless Midnight Chitin
feat-starless_midnight_chitin.subject: Personal

feat-steal_vitality.description:
Target Enemy model loses an Activation Counter.
Choose a Friendly model within 6, that model gains an Activation Counter.
feat-steal_vitality.name: Steal Vitality
feat-steal_vitality.subject: Target

feat-stiletto.description: When this model is involved in a Melee Exchange with a Surprised Enemy model, this model's Shiv weapon gains Pierce (3).
feat-stiletto.name: Stiletto
feat-stiletto.subject: Personal

feat-stir_emotion.description:
Target gains a number of the following Markers equal to the Success Level of the Opposed Test in the order given, up to one of each:
Stunned, Impetuous, Frightened, Berserk.
feat-stir_emotion.name: Stir Emotion
feat-stir_emotion.subject: Target

feat-stolen_glory.description:
When a Friendly Onisho model deals damage in a Melee Exchange in the Pulse, if this model is not in BtB or an Enemy model's ZoC, once the Melee Exchange is resolved this model may immediately Charge the Enemy model.
Neither model loses Activation Counters for this Charge or for participating in the Melee Exchange.
If the Enemy model is removed from play only this model may use the Consume Soul Ki Feat this activation.
feat-stolen_glory.name: Stolen Glory
feat-stolen_glory.subject: Pulse

feat-storm_manipulation.description:
When this model declares a Ranged Attack Action choose one of the following until the Ranged Attack Action is resolved:
• This model's Ranged Weapon's range bands become 4/8/12• This model's Ranged Weapon gains Strength (+1)• This model's Ranged Weapon gains Slam Attack (0)
feat-storm_manipulation.name: Storm Manipulation
feat-storm_manipulation.subject: Personal

feat-storm_path.description:
When this model Runs or Charges this activation, any model moved through gains a Stunned Marker and a Fire (1) Marker.
During this movement, this model may move through Destructible terrain. If it does, remove the terrain from the battlefield.
feat-storm_path.name: Storm Path
feat-storm_path.subject: Personal

feat-strafe.description: This model gains Rapid Fire (2) until the until the current action is resolved.
feat-strafe.name: Strafe
feat-strafe.subject: Personal

feat-strangulation.description: This model's Garrotte Weapon gains Critical Attack (0) and Powerful Attack (0).
feat-strangulation.name: Strangulation
feat-strangulation.subject: Personal

feat-strip_soul.description: Target Enemy model gains one Spirit Block Marker and Insignificant until the End Phase.X is equal to the Ki Statistic of the Targeted Enemy model.
feat-strip_soul.name: Strip Soul
feat-strip_soul.subject: Target

feat-stronger_than_hate.description: Until the end of the current activation, each time this model deals Damage in a Melee Exchange, the Enemy non-Satsui model loses an Activation Counter.
feat-stronger_than_hate.name: Stronger Than Hate
feat-stronger_than_hate.subject: Personal

feat-stubbornness_of_steel.description: This model gains Rise (3) until the End Phase.
feat-stubbornness_of_steel.name: Stubbornness of Steel
feat-stubbornness_of_steel.subject: Personal

feat-subtle_dominance.description: When Target model declares an action it must make a Ki Challenge Test (5), if it fails its activation ends and it loses an Activation Counter.
feat-subtle_dominance.name: Subtle Dominance
feat-subtle_dominance.subject: Target

feat-suit_you_sir.description:
Recruit a permitted Ronin Enhancement - Equipment and add it to Target Friendly Ito Saiaku.
This model must use this Ki Feat every turn. If it does not, Remove all Friendly Ito Saiaku and Servant models that you own from play.
feat-suit_you_sir.name: Suit You, Sir!
feat-suit_you_sir.subject: Target

feat-summon_from_the_shadows.description:
Deploy a Horde Bakemono anywhere within 2" of this model.
If there are no Bakemono cards available with a free wound track this feat cannot be used.
This Warband may use this Ki Feat only once per turn.
feat-summon_from_the_shadows.name: Summon from the Shadows
feat-summon_from_the_shadows.subject: Special

feat-summon_ice_kami.description:
Summon a Ronin Kami of Reflection by Replacing this model (this model is removed from play).
(You cannot have more models in play than the card has Wound Tracks).
If this model was in a Melee Exchange, the Kami can neither be damaged nor deal damage this exchange.
feat-summon_ice_kami.name: Summon Ice Kami
feat-summon_ice_kami.subject: Personal

feat-supplies.description: Remove a Reload Marker from, or and an Ammo Token to, a model in the Pulse.
feat-supplies.name: Supplies
feat-supplies.subject: Pulse

feat-surge.description: Call Lightning Ranged Attacks gain +1 Strength and Slam Attack (0) until the current activation is complete.
feat-surge.name: Surge
feat-surge.subject: Special

feat-suri-ashi.description: After a Melee Exchange is complete, this model may move away from the Enemy model until it leaves its ZoC, at which point its movement ends.
feat-suri-ashi.name: Suri-Ashi
feat-suri-ashi.subject: Personal

feat-swallow_up.description:
Use this Ki Feat at any time except during a model's activation.
Place the Target model Elsewhere. Remove that model's Activation Counters.
In the End Phase, Place the affected model with 2" of this model. If this is not possible, Place that model as close to this model as possible.
If the Ki Feat Targets an Enemy model you must Succeed in an Opposed Size Test.
When this model is removed from play for any reason, first Place any affected models within 2" of this model.
feat-swallow_up.name: Swallow Up
feat-swallow_up.subject: Target

feat-swallow_whole.description:
This feat must be declared before Initiative is determined in a Melee Exchange. If this model's Attack is successful, place the Enemy model Elsewhere.
Affected Enemy models suffer one Wound (ignoring Tough) if they are Elsewhere in the End Phase. For each Wound taken, this model gains 1 Ki Token.
When this model is removed from play for any reason, first place any affected models in BtB with this model. If this model is not on the Battlefield when it is removed from play, affected models gain Flank and return to play using that rule.
feat-swallow_whole.name: Swallow Whole
feat-swallow_whole.subject: Personal

feat-sweep.description: This model gains Sweep Attack (0) until the end of the current activation.
feat-sweep.name: Sweep
feat-sweep.subject: Personal

feat-swift_executor.description:
This model loses Insignificant until the end of this activation.
If this model declares a Wait or Scenario Action, it may Walk a distance equal to its Move Statistic before or after the Action.
feat-swift_executor.name: Swift Executor
feat-swift_executor.subject: Personal

feat-sworn_sisters.description: Target other Friendly Princess model gains an Activation Marker.
feat-sworn_sisters.name: Sworn Sisters
feat-sworn_sisters.subject: Target

feat-tactical_counsel.description: This model's Controller can re-roll the Tactical Roll at the start of any turn.
feat-tactical_counsel.name: Tactical Counsel
feat-tactical_counsel.subject: Special

feat-tactical_master.description: This model gains Command [Friendly](X/8") until the End Phase.
feat-tactical_master.name: Tactical Master
feat-tactical_master.subject: Personal

feat-tail_whip.description:
During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model or a Friendly Faction Shisai model in BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Stunned Marker.
A model may only gain one Stunned Marker per activation as a result of this Ki Feat.
feat-tail_whip.name: Tail Whip
feat-tail_whip.subject: Target

feat-takashi_koryu.description: This model gains Critical Attack (1) until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.
feat-takashi_koryu.name: Takashi Koryu
feat-takashi_koryu.subject: Personal

feat-talon_strike.description:
When this model Successfully uses Counterstrike Defence, after the Success Level has been determined, make the Damage Roll at the Success Level of the Defence, rather than Success Level -2.
After Successfully defending in a Melee Exchange, once the current Activation is complete, this model may Move 3".
feat-talon_strike.name: Talon Strike
feat-talon_strike.subject: Personal

feat-taunt.description: Target Enemy model gains Aggressive until the End Phase.
feat-taunt.name: Taunt
feat-taunt.subject: Target

feat-tax.description: When an Enemy model within the Aura's area of effect uses a Ki Feat or Ki Boost, the cost in Ki Tokens is increased by 1, and this model gains 1 Ki Token.
feat-tax.name: Tax
feat-tax.subject: Aura

feat-tears_for_the_dead.description: Target model gains Defensive and cannot declare Melee, Ranged, or Charge Actions until the End Phase.
feat-tears_for_the_dead.name: Tears for the Dead
feat-tears_for_the_dead.subject: Target

feat-temporal_barrier.description: While within the Aura, models gain Ranged Defence (2).
feat-temporal_barrier.name: Temporal Barrier
feat-temporal_barrier.subject: Aura

feat-ten-uchi.description: This model's weapons gain Unblockable (1) until the current action is resolved.
feat-ten-uchi.name: Ten-Uchi
feat-ten-uchi.subject: Personal

feat-tenacious.description: This model gains Tough (+1) until the End Phase.
feat-tenacious.name: Tenacious
feat-tenacious.subject: Personal

feat-territorial.description: Target Enemy that is not an Animal model that is in BtB with a Scenario Objective or in a Scenario Zone, must choose to either lose an Activation Counter or transfer 1 of Its Ki Tokens to this model.
feat-territorial.name: Territorial
feat-territorial.subject: Target

feat-terror_inducing_performance.description: Enemy models with Poisoned and Frightened Markers suffer -2 Melee penalty rather than -1 for Frightened.
feat-terror_inducing_performance.name: Terror Inducing Performance
feat-terror_inducing_performance.subject: Aura

feat-thanatophobia.description:
Frightened models in the Pulse take a Success Level 2 Damage Roll.
X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens on this model after paying for this Ki Feat.
feat-thanatophobia.name: Thanatophobia
feat-thanatophobia.subject: Pulse

feat-the_oppressed.description:
Target non-Exhausted Enemy model must be chosen to activate next, ignoring Impetuous Markers.
The Opposing Player may not declare the use of a Pass Token next activation.
That model gains Insignificant until the end of their next activation.
feat-the_oppressed.name: The Oppressed
feat-the_oppressed.subject: Target

feat-the_void_stares_back.description:
Target non-Satsui Enemy model which has LoS to this model.
Make a Success Level 4 Damage Roll on the Target model.
Wounds caused by this Ki Feat ignore Armour.
A model can only be targeted by this feat (from any source) once per turn.
The Range of this feat may be measured from a Void Rift.
If this feat causes any Wounds, add 1 Void Counter to the Blessings of the Void Communal Card.
feat-the_void_stares_back.name: The Void Stares Back
feat-the_void_stares_back.subject: Target

feat-they_dont_like_it_up_em.description:
Friendly Ashigaru with Reach Weapons, in the Aura gain Fear (X).
X is equal to the number of Ashigaru in the Aura.
feat-they_dont_like_it_up_em.name: They Don't Like it Up 'Em!
feat-they_dont_like_it_up_em.subject: Aura

feat-thrash.description: Models in a Melee Exchange with this model lose the Dodge trait until the current action is resolved.
feat-thrash.name: Thrash
feat-thrash.subject: Personal

feat-threat.description:
Enemy models ending a move in the Aura or Placed into the Aura must turn to directly face this model.
This Model loses Camouflage while using this Ki Feat.
feat-threat.name: Threat
feat-threat.subject: Aura

feat-three_shots_per_minute.description: This model removes all Reload Markers.
feat-three_shots_per_minute.name: Three Shots Per Minute
feat-three_shots_per_minute.subject: Personal

feat-thresher.description: This model gains Indomitable (1) and Split Attack until the current action is resolved.
feat-thresher.name: Thresher
feat-thresher.subject: Personal

feat-tidal_flow.description:
Use this Ki Feat at the start of any Activation, Move this model up to 4/” towards an Enemy table edge (Any edge which touches an enemy deployment zone).
At the end of this Activation, Move this model 4/” towards the opposite table edge.
This Ki Feat may only be used once per activation.
feat-tidal_flow.name: Tidal Flow
feat-tidal_flow.subject: Personal

feat-tide_master.description: This model gains one of the following until the current Ranged Attack is resolved: *Ranged Weapon Bands become 4/8/12*When making a Ranged Attack this model does not need LoS and ignores Cover*This model's RTanged Weapon gains Sweep Attack (0).
feat-tide_master.name: Tide Master
feat-tide_master.subject: Personal

feat-tiger_strike.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Bleed (1/1) and Sharp (1) until the current activation is complete.
feat-tiger_strike.name: Tiger Strike
feat-tiger_strike.subject: Personal

feat-time_reversal.description: All other models gain up to 2 Activation Counters to a maximum of 2.
feat-time_reversal.name: Time Reversal
feat-time_reversal.subject: Special

feat-time_skip.description: Remove all Activation Counters from the board.
feat-time_skip.name: Time Skip
feat-time_skip.subject: Special

feat-time_spiral.description: This model gains Cloudwalk, Sweep Attack (0), and Unblockable (1) until the end of the current action.
feat-time_spiral.name: Time Spiral
feat-time_spiral.subject: Personal

feat-time_splice.description:
When this model successfully Damages an Opponent in a Melee Exchange, after the Melee Exchange is resolved, Place this model anywhere within 1" of the Enemy model and not in its LoS or within a Spirit Ward Aura (If this is not possible this feat cannot be used).
If this model has a remaining Activation Counter after this activation is completed, you may become the Active Player again and begin this model's activation.
feat-time_splice.name: Time Splice
feat-time_splice.subject: Personal

feat-timely_arrival.description:
During an Enemy model's Activation, when that model moves into BtB with another Friendly Villager or Dog model in the Pulse, place this model into BtB with that Enemy model.
If it is not possible to put this model in BtB with the Enemy model this feat cannot be used.
feat-timely_arrival.name: Timely Arrival
feat-timely_arrival.subject: Pulse

feat-times_favour.description: Enemy models in the Pulse gain Slow until the current action is resolved.
feat-times_favour.name: Time's Favour
feat-times_favour.subject: Pulse

feat-to_the_front!.description: Friendly Bushi models in the Aura do not suffer the Melee Penalty for having Run.
feat-to_the_front!.name: To the Front!
feat-to_the_front!.subject: Aura

feat-tokkikos_choice.description: When an Enemy model that is not Soulless in the Pulse is Killed, Replace it with a Friendly Miyakomo's Echo.
feat-tokkikos_choice.name: Tokkiko's Choice
feat-tokkikos_choice.subject: Pulse

feat-tornado.description:
When a Friendly model within 2" is the Target of a failed Ranged Attack, immediately make a Ranged Attack.
The Range Bands, Strength bonus and any applicable traits or unique effects on the model which failed the Ranged Attack are used instead of any such traits or effects on this model.
This model ignores the effects of Ammo and Reload traits while resolving this Ki Feat.
feat-tornado.name: Tornado
feat-tornado.subject: Personal

feat-total_loyalty.description: This model gains Bodyguard [Samurai, Shisai](2") until the End Phase.
feat-total_loyalty.name: Total Loyalty
feat-total_loyalty.subject: Personal

feat-touch_the_silence.description:
When this model is successfully attacked in a Melee Exchange, prevent X Wounds.
For each Wound prevented the model making the attack suffers 1 Wound, ignoring Tough.
feat-touch_the_silence.name: Touch the Silence
feat-touch_the_silence.subject: Special

feat-touch_the_void.description:
When this model is successfully attacked in a Melee Exchange, before the Damage Roll spend X Ki Tokens. X may not be greater than 3.
For each Ki Token spent, prevent one Wound.
For each Wound prevented the model making the attack suffers one Wound, ignoring Tough.
feat-touch_the_void.name: Touch the Void
feat-touch_the_void.subject: Special

feat-trade.description: This model gains Channel (10/8") and Leech (10/8") until the End Phase.
feat-trade.name: Trade
feat-trade.subject: Personal

feat-tsukkakaru.description: This model gains Banzai! until the current action is resolved.
feat-tsukkakaru.name: Tsukkakaru
feat-tsukkakaru.subject: Personal

feat-tsunami.description:
Enemy models in the Pulse must pass a Size Challenge Test (7), or be moved directly away from this Riku until they hit an Impassable terrain feature, a model which passes its Size Challenge Test or until they have moved 8".
If another model is contacted by models being moved by this feat, it must make a Size Challenge (6) Test or be pushed along with the original model.
feat-tsunami.name: Tsunami
feat-tsunami.subject: Pulse

feat-twisting_your_mind.description: This model and Friendly Ningyo gain Regenerate (1) until the End Phase.
feat-twisting_your_mind.name: Twisting Your Mind
feat-twisting_your_mind.subject: Special

feat-two-man_rule.description:
During an Enemy model's activation, when the Enemy model moves into BtB with another Friendly model in the Pulse, choose another different Friendly model in the Pulse.
Move the chosen Friendly model into BtB with the Enemy model by the shortest route.
If it is not possible to put the chosen Friendly model in BtB with the Enemy model, this feat cannot be used.
feat-two-man_rule.name: Two-Man Rule
feat-two-man_rule.subject: Pulse

feat-umbrella_block.description: This model gains Parry (1) until the end of the current Melee Exchange
feat-umbrella_block.name: Umbrella Block
feat-umbrella_block.subject: Personal

feat-unapproachable.description: Until the end of the current activation, increase the cost of special abilities of Enemy models in a Melee Exchange with this model by 1.
feat-unapproachable.name: Unapproachable
feat-unapproachable.subject: Special

feat-unassailable.description: This model gains Indomitable (+2) until the End Phase.
feat-unassailable.name: Unassailable
feat-unassailable.subject: Personal

feat-uncloak.description:
Use this feat in the Starting Phase or when this model is targeted by an enemy effect or a model declares an action or resolves an effect that will bring it into BtB with this model while this model is undamaged.

Replace this model with a Loyal Samurai you own that is currently Elsewhere, and place this model Elsewhere.
This model gains the Flank trait and returns to play using those rules.
If the Enemy Model initiated a Melee Exchange, it is now Surprised.
Transfer State Markers, Activation Counters and any tokens to the Samurai's profile card.
feat-uncloak.name: Uncloak
feat-uncloak.subject: Personal

feat-unholy_vitality.description:
Target model takes half its remaining Wounds, ignoring Durable (Rounded down) then gains a Activation Counter.
lf used on an Enemy model you must succeed in an opposed Ki Test.
feat-unholy_vitality.name: Unholy Vitality
feat-unholy_vitality.subject: Target

feat-unify.description: Target Friendly model gains Co-ordinated Attack [Friendly] until the End Phase.
feat-unify.name: Unify
feat-unify.subject: Target

feat-unleash_envy.description:
Summon and Deploy an Envy within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model.
Place a number of Ki Tokens on Envy's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed.
There may only be one Friendly Envy in play at any time.
This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Envy in play.
feat-unleash_envy.name: Unleash Envy
feat-unleash_envy.subject: Special

feat-unleash_gluttony.description:
Summon and Deploy a Gluttony within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model.
Place a number of Ki Tokens on Gluttony's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed.
There may only be one Friendly Gluttony in play at any time.
This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Gluttony in play.
feat-unleash_gluttony.name: Unleash Gluttony
feat-unleash_gluttony.subject: Special

feat-unleash_sloth.description:
Summon and Deploy a Sloth within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model.
Place a number of Ki Tokens on Sloth's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed.
There may only be one Friendly Sloth in play at any time.
This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Sloth in play.
feat-unleash_sloth.name: Unleash Sloth
feat-unleash_sloth.subject: Special

feat-unleash_wrath.description:
Summon and Deploy a Wrath within 2" of this model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model.
Place a number of Ki Tokens on Wrath's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed.
There may only be one Friendly Wrath in play in play at any time.
This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Wrath in play.
feat-unleash_wrath.name: Unleash Wrath
feat-unleash_wrath.subject: Special

feat-unnatural_sanguine_strength.description: This model's Mandibles Melee Weapon gains +X Strength until the end of the current Activation.
feat-unnatural_sanguine_strength.name: Unnatural Sanguine Strength
feat-unnatural_sanguine_strength.subject: Personal

feat-unreasonable_eight_foot_stride.description: Place this model in contact with any Webbed Ground Terrain.
feat-unreasonable_eight_foot_stride.name: Unreasonable Eight Foot Stride
feat-unreasonable_eight_foot_stride.subject: Personal

feat-unseen_anger.description: This model gains Lightning Reflexes until the current action is resolved.
feat-unseen_anger.name: Unseen Anger
feat-unseen_anger.subject: Personal

feat-vault.description: This model gains Cloudwalk until the End Phase.
feat-vault.name: Vault
feat-vault.subject: Personal

feat-veteran.description: This model does not suffer Melee dice penalties due to States until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.
feat-veteran.name: Veteran
feat-veteran.subject: Personal

feat-vicious_strike.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Sharp (+1) until the current action is resolved.
feat-vicious_strike.name: Vicious Strike
feat-vicious_strike.subject: Personal

feat-vital_strike.description: This model's Melee Weapons gain Sharp (2) until the current activation is resolved.
feat-vital_strike.name: Vital Strike
feat-vital_strike.subject: Personal

feat-vitality.description: This model gains an Activation Counter.
feat-vitality.name: Vitality
feat-vitality.subject: Personal

feat-vivacity.description: Add an activation counter to This Model's Card.
feat-vivacity.name: Vivacity
feat-vivacity.subject: Special

feat-voice_of_the_wind.description:
Place Target Model within 1" of its current location.
If the Target model is an Enemy, you must first succeed in an Opposed Ki Test with the Target model.
This Ki Feat can only be used once per activation.
feat-voice_of_the_wind.name: Voice of the Wind
feat-voice_of_the_wind.subject: Target

feat-wailing_shomyo.description:
Enemy models in the Aura cannot benefit from Enhancement cards.
X is equal to the number of models that were recruited into this Warband but have been Killed or removed from play.
feat-wailing_shomyo.name: Wailing Shōmyō
feat-wailing_shomyo.subject: Aura

feat-wall_of_water.description: Enemy models treat the Aura as [Difficult, Obscuring, Small] terrain and must pass a Size Challenge Test (6) to enter BtB with this model; if the Test is failed that model may not enter BtB with this model this activation.
feat-wall_of_water.name: Wall of Water
feat-wall_of_water.subject: Aura

feat-war_cry.description: This model gains Fear (6) until the current action is resolved.
feat-war_cry.name: War Cry
feat-war_cry.subject: Personal

feat-warding_shōmyō.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (1/6") until the End Phase and while within the Aura Enemy models cannot use Special Attacks or Defences.
feat-warding_shōmyō.name: Warding Shōmyō
feat-warding_shōmyō.subject: Aura

feat-warning_bark.description:
Friendly Models remove Prone Markers and cannot be surprised for the rest of the current activation.
Friendly Models that were Deployed this turn or are later Deployed this turn gain one Activation Counter.
feat-warning_bark.name: Warning Bark
feat-warning_bark.subject: Special

feat-warning_rattle.description:
During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Frightened Marker.
Remove the Frightened Marker in the End Phase.
feat-warning_rattle.name: Warning Rattle
feat-warning_rattle.subject: Target

feat-warrant.description: Target Enemy model gains a Death Sentence Marker.
feat-warrant.name: Warrant
feat-warrant.subject: Target

feat-wasp_punch.description: This model gains Strong until the end of the current Melee Exchange.
feat-wasp_punch.name: Wasp Punch
feat-wasp_punch.subject: Personal

feat-webs_of_spirit_and_soul.description: While an Enemy model is Poisoned in the Aura it gains -2 Move.
feat-webs_of_spirit_and_soul.name: Webs of Spirit and Soul
feat-webs_of_spirit_and_soul.subject: Aura

feat-weight_of_shadows.description: This model gains Strong until the current action is resolved.
feat-weight_of_shadows.name: Weight of Shadows
feat-weight_of_shadows.subject: Personal

feat-whipping_boy.description:
Transfer any Berserk, Bleeding, Blind, Controlled, Death Sentence, Diseased, Frightened, Immobilised, Impetuous, On Fire, Poisoned, Spirit Block, and Stunned Markers from Target model to this model.
This model marks a number of wound boxes equal to the number of State Markers gained.
feat-whipping_boy.name: Whipping Boy
feat-whipping_boy.subject: Target

feat-whirlwind_kick.description: This model gains Indomitable (2) and Split Attack until the End Phase. Add 1 additional Attack die to each exchange when using Split Attack until the End Phase.
feat-whirlwind_kick.name: Whirlwind Kick
feat-whirlwind_kick.subject: Personal

feat-whispers_of_the_void.description:
Use only in the Main Phase.
Add 1 to this model's statistics until the current activation is complete. This is considered a Ki Boost.
feat-whispers_of_the_void.name: Whispers of the Void
feat-whispers_of_the_void.subject: Personal

feat-whistling_shriek.description:
Centre an X” Pulse on the Target. Models in the Pulse lose Sixth Sense.
X is equal to the number of whole inches in the range to the Target.
feat-whistling_shriek.name: Whistling Shriek
feat-whistling_shriek.subject: Target

feat-white_out.description:
Enemy models treat the Aura as [Normal, Obscuring,Large] Terrain.
Models in the Aura are in a Blizzard, those models gain Cover and Slow.
Before or after this model's action, if it is within a Blizzard, you may Place it within 1" of its current location.
feat-white_out.name: White Out
feat-white_out.subject: Aura

feat-will_of_yurei.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (1/2") until the End Phase.
feat-will_of_yurei.name: Will of Yurei
feat-will_of_yurei.subject: Personal

feat-wing_buffet.description: All models in the Pulse's area of effect must succeed in a Size Challenge Test (6) or Walk D3" directly away from this model.
feat-wing_buffet.name: Wing Buffet
feat-wing_buffet.subject: Pulse

feat-wrestle.description: This model gains Grapple Defence (0), Throw Attack (0) and Slam Attack (0) until the end of the current Activation.
feat-wrestle.name: Wrestle
feat-wrestle.subject: Personal

feat-yoko-men.description: Models involved in a Melee Exchange with this model lose the Dodge trait until the current action is resolved.
feat-yoko-men.name: Yoko-Men
feat-yoko-men.subject: Personal

feat-embrace_the_coil.description:
Choose an Izu Serpent model that is not currently in play.
Summon and Deploy the chosen lzu Serpent model in BB with the Target model, ignoring the usual BtB restriction on Deploying a model.
The Target gains a State Marker depending on the lzu Serpent chosen:
- Asp: Poisoned (2) Marker
- Boa Constrictor: Immobilised Marker
- Cobra: Blind Marker
feat-embrace_the_coil.name: Embrace the Coil
feat-embrace_the_coil.subject: Target

feat-cripple.description: Target model gains Weak and loses Reach and Lightning Reflexes until the End Phase.
feat-cripple.name: Cripple
feat-cripple.subject: Target

feat-thousand_kin.description: This model gains Co-ordinated Attack [Bakemono] until the current Melee Exchange is resolved.
feat-thousand_kin.name: Thousand Kin
feat-thousand_kin.subject: Personal

feat-vigour.description: This model gains 1 Activation Counter, then discard this card.
feat-vigour.name: Vigour
feat-vigour.subject: Special

feat-hari_kiri.description:
Remove this model from play.
For each unmarked Damage Box on this model, remove a Shame Token from another model.
feat-hari_kiri.name: Hari-Kiri
feat-hari_kiri.subject: Personal

feat-loyal_to_the_dragon.description: This model gains Bodyguard [Takashi] (3") until the End Phase.
feat-loyal_to_the_dragon.name: Loyal to the Dragon
feat-loyal_to_the_dragon.subject: Personal

feat-strikedown.description: When this model deals Damage in a Melee Exchange, the Enemy model gains a Prone Marker.
feat-strikedown.name: Strikedown
feat-strikedown.subject: Personal

feat-ice_manipulation.description:
When this model declares a Ranged Attack Action this model gains +1 Ranged Pool and chooses one of the following until the current Ranged Attack Action is resolved:
- this model ignores Camouflage and Cover
- this model's Ranged Weapon gains Pierce (3) and Sharp (3)
- this model's Ranged Weapon cannot declare a Special Attack and gains Rapid Fire (3)
feat-ice_manipulation.name: Ice Manipulation
feat-ice_manipulation.subject: Personal

feat-hooked_leg_pincers.description: While within Webbed Ground Terrain, this model gains Immovable.
feat-hooked_leg_pincers.name: Hooked Leg Pincers
feat-hooked_leg_pincers.subject: Personal

feat-shield_of_light.description:
When a Friendly model within the pulse is successfully attacked in a Melee Exchange, before the Damage Roll spend X Ki Tokens.
X may not be greater than 3.
For each Ki Token spent, prevent one Wound.
The model making the attack gains a Stunned Marker
feat-shield_of_light.name: Shield of Light
feat-shield_of_light.subject: Pulse

feat-the_oncoming_storm.description:
Replace this model by Summoning and Deploying any Ronin Lesser Air Kami (ignoring which Faction may recruit that model), remove this model and place it Elsewhere. You still cannot have more of that Kami model in play than the Max value on its card.
If this model is Elsewhere, it may use this feat.
Replace a Friendly Ronin Lesser Air Kami that you own with this model. Remove the Kami from play.
feat-the_oncoming_storm.name: The Oncoming Storm
feat-the_oncoming_storm.subject: Special

feat-raijins_breath.description: This model gains +2 Move and Cloudwalk until the current activation is resolved, then discard this card.
feat-raijins_breath.name: Raijin's Breath
feat-raijins_breath.subject: Personal

feat-chest_thump.description:
This model gains Impenetrable Defence.
Friendly Ape or Gorilla models in the Aura have Cover and gain Immovable.
This Aura ends if this model moves.
feat-chest_thump.name: Chest Thump
feat-chest_thump.subject: Aura

feat-go_ape.description: When a Friendly Ape or Gorilla model successfully uses a Throw Special Ability, the distance the Enemy model Moves is 6".
feat-go_ape.name: Go Ape!
feat-go_ape.subject: Target

feat-life_insurance.description: Remove X Investment Counters from the Investment Card to prevent X Damage on this model.
feat-life_insurance.name: Life Insurance
feat-life_insurance.subject: Personal

feat-invest_in_ammo.description: Remove X Investment Counter from the Investment Card to remove X Reloading Markers from Friendly models in the Pulse.
feat-invest_in_ammo.name: Invest in Ammo!
feat-invest_in_ammo.subject: Pulse

feat-compound_interest.description: Remove X Investment Counters from Investment Card to gain X Ki Tokens and gain Channel (X,X").
feat-compound_interest.name: Compound Interest
feat-compound_interest.subject: Personal

feat-corvine_intel.description: Target Friendly model gains Tactician (+1) until the End Phase.
feat-corvine_intel.name: Corvine Intel
feat-corvine_intel.subject: Target

feat-animal_master.description: This model gains Order [Animal] (6") until the End Phase.
feat-animal_master.name: Animal Master
feat-animal_master.subject: Personal

feat-squall_strike.description:
If this model has made a damage roll during a Melee Exchange, once the Melee Exchange is resolved, Place it up to 1" from its current location.
Then Place up to two other Friendly Tengu models within the Pulse up to 1" from their current locations.
feat-squall_strike.name: Squall Strike
feat-squall_strike.subject: Pulse

feat-spiritual_nexus.description:
Friendly Faction models within the Aura can use this model as point of origin for Target or Pulse Ki Feats until the End Phase.
Use this model to draw LoS and Range for the Ki Feat.
Friendly models within the Aura may use this model to measure the range of Call Lightning ranged attacks.
If range is measured from this model, the Ranged Attack cannot Surprise its Target.
feat-spiritual_nexus.name: Spiritual Nexus
feat-spiritual_nexus.subject: Aura

feat-amazed_by_the_void.description:
While in BtB with Target Friendly Faction model, Enemy models increase the cost of Ki Feats and Special Abilities by one, this Ki Feat last until the End Phase.
While benefiting from this Ki Feat, Target model's ranged weapons gain Lightweight.
feat-amazed_by_the_void.name: Amazed by the Void
feat-amazed_by_the_void.subject: Target

feat-fight_or_flight.description: 'This model gains either Banzai! or Cloudwalk until the current activation is resolved.
feat-fight_or_flight.name: Fight or Flight
feat-fight_or_flight.subject: Personal

feat-to_my_side.description: When an Enemy model declares an action that would bring it into BtB with this model, move a Friendly Golden Sentinel model within the Pulse into BtB with the Enemy model by the shortest route.
feat-to_my_side.name: To My Side!
feat-to_my_side.subject: Pulse

feat-page_from_the_book.description:
When a model declares a Scenario Action, remove an additional Activation Counter for a Simple Action or one fewer Activation Counters if Complex.
If the model cannot remove all Activation Counters reguired, the activation ends without taking effect and the model removes an Activation Counter.
This Ki Feat is Opposed Ki when targeting an Enemy model.
This is a Trap effect.
feat-page_from_the_book.name: Page from the Book
feat-page_from_the_book.subject: Target

feat-the_crowds_part.description:
This model may Move 2" at the end of its current activation.
An Enemy model in BtB may transfer 2 Ki Tokens to this model to prevent this Move.
feat-the_crowds_part.name: The Crowds Part
feat-the_crowds_part.subject: Personal

feat-scheme.description:
Remove all Scheme Tokens and recruit a permitted Event Card with cost equal to or less than the number of Scheme Tokens removed.
This can be used to recruit a variable cost Event Card as long as the final cost is equal to or less than the number of Scheme Tokens removed.
The card recruited is Hidden Information.
feat-scheme.name: Scheme
feat-scheme.subject: Special

feat-contingency_plan.description:
When this model would be Killed, instead Deploy it outside of Enemy Model's LoS, and unmark all marked Wound Boxes.
If this model would be Killed by an Enemy model, you must first pass an Opposed Ki Test against that model to use this Ki Feat.
feat-contingency_plan.name: Contingency Plan
feat-contingency_plan.subject: Personal

feat-martial_discipline.description: Target Sohei model gains Prowess [Defence](1) or Prowess [Attack](1) until the end of the current Activation.
feat-martial_discipline.name: Martial Discipline
feat-martial_discipline.subject: Target

feat-focusing_shomyo.description: Friendly Sohei models in the Aura gain Melee Boost (2).
feat-focusing_shomyo.name: Focusing Shomyo
feat-focusing_shomyo.subject: Aura

feat-hunting_fox.description: When a Friendly Kitsune model in the Pulse makes a Melee Damage Roll, if the values on the two dice are the same it gains +3 Weapon Strength for that roll.
feat-hunting_fox.name: Hunting Fox
feat-hunting_fox.subject: Pulse

feat-foxs_cunning.description: When a Friendly Kitsune model in the Pulse is subject to a Damage Roll, ignore the next roll entirely if the values on the two dice are the same.
feat-foxs_cunning.name: Fox's Cunning
feat-foxs_cunning.subject: Pulse

feat-outfox.description:
Use this Ki Feat when an Enemy model initiates a Melee Exchange with this model.
This model gains Tireless until the end of the current Activation.
feat-outfox.name: Outfox
feat-outfox.subject: Personal

feat-reforged_edge.description: This model's weapons gain Sharp (1) and Pierce (1) until the current action is resolved.
feat-reforged_edge.name: Reforged Edge
feat-reforged_edge.subject: Personal

feat-undying_finale.description:
During the Starting Phase, Target a Friendly Kami that has maximum Ki Tokens.
When choosing one of their Unique Effects, if the model would be removed from play, it instead remains in play but suffers one Damage.
feat-undying_finale.name: Undying Finale
feat-undying_finale.subject: Target

feat-soul_of_a_kami.description: Target Friendly Kami gains 1 Ki Token and loses Insignificant until the end of the current activation.
feat-soul_of_a_kami.name: Soul of a Kami
feat-soul_of_a_kami.subject: Target

feat-return_to_serve.description:
Target a Friendly Shìbīng or Rui Jin.
Return to play another of the same model type and Deploy it in BtB with the Target with X unmarked Wound Boxes that was recruited into the Warband but has been Killed or removed from play.
This Warband may only use this Ki Feat once per game.
feat-return_to_serve.name: Return to Serve
feat-return_to_serve.subject: Target

feat-stone_spike.description: Until the end of the current activation, when this model takes Damage in a Melee Exchange, the Enemy model suffers 1 Damage, ignoring Tough.
feat-stone_spike.name: Stone Spike
feat-stone_spike.subject: Personal

feat-clay_soldier.description:
This model gains an Activation Counter.
This Ki Feat may be used while this model is represented by a Terrain Card.
feat-clay_soldier.name: Clay Soldier
feat-clay_soldier.subject: Personal

feat-volley_fire.description:
This model makes a Ranged Attack using their Chu-ko-nu weapon, Friendly Bǎi Qiān models in the Pulse may also make one Ranged Attack using their Chu-ko-nu weapon.
Models may only be affected by this Ki Feat once per turn.
feat-volley_fire.name: Volley Fire
feat-volley_fire.subject: Pulse

feat-stone_soldier.description:
Friendly Shìbīng models gain an Activation Counter.
This Ki Feat may be used while this model is represented by a Terrain Card.
feat-stone_soldier.name: Stone Soldier
feat-stone_soldier.subject: Special

feat-the_wind_carries.description: Target Friendly Bǎi Qiān gains Lightfooted and gains an Air Token until the End Phase.
feat-the_wind_carries.name: The Wind Carries
feat-the_wind_carries.subject: Target

feat-heavy_blow.description: This model gains Strong [Melee] for the next Damage Roll.
feat-heavy_blow.name: Heavy Blow
feat-heavy_blow.subject: Personal

feat-duty_in_stone.description: This model gains an Activation Counter.
feat-duty_in_stone.name: Duty in Stone
feat-duty_in_stone.subject: Personal

feat-implacable_service.description: This model gains Durable and Endurance until the end of the current activation.
feat-implacable_service.name: Implacable Service
feat-implacable_service.subject: Personal
